comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Alex Arcasa and Stansil Powell were students at Carlisle Indian School where, along with Jim Thorpe, they played on the football team coached by "Pop" Warner which defeated West Point in 1912. Stan Powell was also Thorpe's teammate on the 1923 Oorang Indians NFL team. Here's the Nov. 10, 1912 NY Times article about the Carlisle victory over the Army cadets.
